name: Lemon Game
description:
Lemon Game is a side-scrolling shooter made in conjunction with my Twitch chat, which goes to explain some of the more unusual art assets. The objective is to get the highest score possible, while picking up powerups to aid you as the difficulty ramps up. The game currently doesn't have a tutorial so the controls are as follows:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

Aim and Shoot: Mouse

Credit to @Flightless_Plane for a lot of the art assets!
